## slu sleep random

Sleep random time

```
slu sleep random [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help      help for random
      --max int   Maximum sleep time (in ms) (default 1000)
      --min int   Minimum sleep time (in ms)
  -v, --verbose   verbose output
```
